references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Stable Diffusion model, a foundational model for the work presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Lora: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a technique used in the current paper for efficient multi-garment feature extraction.

references.paper_title: Mm-diff: High-fidelity image personalization via multi-modal condition integration
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for high-fidelity image personalization using multi-modal condition integration, relevant to the task of virtual dressing.

references.paper_title: High-fidelity image personalization via multi-modal condition integration
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for high-fidelity image personalization using multi-modal condition integration, relevant to the task of virtual dressing.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is used in the current work for evaluating image generation quality.
